languages.text: {n}Голос Кибеллы неожиданно начинает множиться, словно каждое слово произносят несколько девушек одновременно.{/n} "По нитям, что сплетаются в паутину. По лучам звезды, в центре которой лед обращается в пламя. По следам, оставленным друг для друга, сойдемся мы в единении, что станет откровением. В смерти, что несет прозрение и истину. В смерти, что станет общим уделом..." {n}Ваши ноги внезапно подкашиваются — тревога, не покидавшая вас с начала ритуала, стальным обручем скручивается вокруг горла.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Голос Кибеллы неожиданно начинает множиться, словно каждое слово произносят несколько культисток.{/n} "По нитям, что сплетаются в паутину, по лучам звезды, в центре которой лед обращается в пламя, по следам, оставленным друг для друга, сойдемся мы в единении, что станет откровением — в смерти, что несет прозрение и истину, в смерти, что станет общим уделом..." {n}Ваши ноги внезапно подкашиваются — тревога, не покидавшая вас с самого начала ритуала, стальным обручем начинает скручиваться вокруг горла...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Suddenly, Kibellah's voice seems to multiply, as if every word were being spoken by several copies of her in unison:{/n} "Along the threads that form the web; along the rays of the star whose heart turns ice into flame; along the tracks we have left for one another, we shall come together in a unity that will become our revelation — in death which grants true sight; in death for which all are fated..." {n}Your knees buckle — the anxiety that has been with you since the beginning of the ritual now clamps around your throat like a collar of steel.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Голос Кибеллы неожиданно начинает множиться, словно каждое слово произносят несколько девушек одновременно.{/n} "По нитям, что сплетаются в паутину. По лучам звезды, в центре которой лед обращается в пламя. По следам, оставленным друг для друга, сойдемся мы в единении, что станет откровением. В смерти, что несет прозрение и истину. В смерти, что станет общим уделом..." {n}Ваши ноги внезапно подкашиваются — тревога, не покидавшая вас с начала ритуала, стальным обручем скручивается вокруг горла.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Suddenly, Kibellah's voice seems to multiply, as if every word is being spoken by several copies of her in unison:{/n} "Along the threads that form the web. Along the rays of the star whose heart turns ice into flame. Along the tracks we have left for one another, we shall come together in unity which will become our revelation. In death which grants true sight. In death for which all are fated..." {n}Your knees buckle — the anxiety that has been with you since the beginning of the ritual now clamps around your throat like a collar of steel.{/n}

{n}Suddenly, Kibellah's voice seems to multiply, as if every word were being spoken by several copies of her in unison:{/n} "Along the threads that form the web; along the rays of the star whose heart turns ice into flame; along the tracks we have left for one another, we shall come together in a unity that will become our revelation — in death which grants true sight; in death for which all are fated..." {n}Your knees buckle — the anxiety that has been with you since the beginning of the ritual now clamps around your throat like a collar of steel.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Plötzlich scheint sich Kibellahs Stimme zu vervielfältigen, als würde jedes Wort von mehreren Kibellahs im Einklang gesprochen werden:{/n} "An den Fäden entlang, die das Netz bilden; an den Strahlen des Sterns entlang, dessen Herz Eis in Flamme verwandelt; an den Spuren entlang, die wir füreinander hinterlassen haben, werden wir zu einer Einheit zusammenfinden, die zu unserer Erkenntnis wird — im Tod, der die wahre Sicht gewährt; im Tod, der uns allen vorherbestimmt ist ..." {n}Deine Knie werden weich. Die Unruhe, die dich seit Beginn des Rituals begleitet, legt sich jetzt um deine Kehle wie ein stählernes Halsband.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, Kibellah's voice seems to multiply, as if every word were being spoken by several copies of her in unison:{/n} "Along the threads that form the web; along the rays of the star whose heart turns ice into flame; along the tracks we have left for one another, we shall come together in a unity that will become our revelation — in death which grants true sight; in death for which all are fated..." {n}Your knees buckle — the anxiety that has been with you since the beginning of the ritual now clamps around your throat like a collar of steel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Plötzlich scheint sich Kibellahs Stimme zu vervielfältigen, als würde jedes Wort von mehreren Kibellahs im Einklang gesprochen werden:{/n} "An den Fäden entlang, die das Netz bilden; an den Strahlen des Sterns entlang, dessen Herz Eis in Flamme verwandelt; an den Spuren entlang, die wir füreinander hinterlassen haben, werden wir zu einer Einheit zusammenfinden, die zu unserer Erkenntnis wird — im Tod, der die wahre Sicht gewährt; im Tod, der uns allen vorherbestimmt ist ..." {n}Deine Knie werden weich. Die Unruhe, die dich seit Beginn des Rituals begleitet, legt sich jetzt um deine Kehle wie ein stählernes Halsband.{/n}

languages.text: {n}De repente, la voz de Kibellah parece multiplicarse, como si cada palabra se pronunciara por varias copias de ella al unísono:{/n} «Por los hilos que forman la red, por los rayos de la estrella cuyo corazón convierte el hielo en llamas, por las huellas que nos dejamos unos a otros, nos congregaremos en una unidad que será nuestra revelación: en la muerte, que otorga la visión verdadera; en la muerte, a la que todos estamos destinados...». {n}Tus rodillas flaquean. El desasosiego que te acompaña desde el comienzo del ritual atenaza ahora tu garganta como un collar de acero.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, Kibellah's voice seems to multiply, as if every word were being spoken by several copies of her in unison:{/n} "Along the threads that form the web; along the rays of the star whose heart turns ice into flame; along the tracks we have left for one another, we shall come together in a unity that will become our revelation — in death which grants true sight; in death for which all are fated..." {n}Your knees buckle — the anxiety that has been with you since the beginning of the ritual now clamps around your throat like a collar of steel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}De repente, la voz de Kibellah parece multiplicarse, como si cada palabra se pronunciara por varias copias de ella al unísono:{/n} «Por los hilos que forman la red, por los rayos de la estrella cuyo corazón convierte el hielo en llamas, por las huellas que nos dejamos unos a otros, nos congregaremos en una unidad que será nuestra revelación: en la muerte, que otorga la visión verdadera; en la muerte, a la que todos estamos destinados...». {n}Tus rodillas flaquean. El desasosiego que te acompaña desde el comienzo del ritual atenaza ahora tu garganta como un collar de acero.{/n}

languages.text: {n}不意にキベラの声が何倍もの大きさになる。まるで言葉の一つ一つが複数人に増えた彼女によって同時に語られているかのようだ。{/n}「網を形作る糸に沿って。その心は氷を炎に変える星の光に沿って。私たちがお互いへと残した足跡に沿って、啓示となる結束の中へと集うだろう…真なる視力を与える死において。すべての者がさだめづけられている死において…」{n}膝がガクガクと震える。儀式が始まって以来付きまとい続けてきた不安が今、鋼鉄の首輪のようにあなたの喉を締め付ける。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, Kibellah's voice seems to multiply, as if every word were being spoken by several copies of her in unison:{/n} "Along the threads that form the web; along the rays of the star whose heart turns ice into flame; along the tracks we have left for one another, we shall come together in a unity that will become our revelation — in death which grants true sight; in death for which all are fated..." {n}Your knees buckle — the anxiety that has been with you since the beginning of the ritual now clamps around your throat like a collar of steel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}不意にキベラの声が何倍もの大きさになる。まるで言葉の一つ一つが複数人に増えた彼女によって同時に語られているかのようだ。{/n}「網を形作る糸に沿って。その心は氷を炎に変える星の光に沿って。私たちがお互いへと残した足跡に沿って、啓示となる結束の中へと集うだろう…真なる視力を与える死において。すべての者がさだめづけられている死において…」{n}膝がガクガクと震える。儀式が始まって以来付きまとい続けてきた不安が今、鋼鉄の首輪のようにあなたの喉を締め付ける。{/n}

languages.text: {n}突然之间，绮贝菈的声音似乎从四面八方传来，仿佛每个字都是由很多个她齐声说出的。{/n}“沿着构成罗网的丝线，沿着恒星散发的光芒，它的心脏将寒冰化为烈焰。沿着我们为彼此留下的足迹前进，我们凝聚在一起，羁绊会为我们带来启示。通过死亡，我们会得知真理，在注定避无可避地死亡之中……”{n}你感觉膝盖发软。从仪式刚刚开始时，焦虑就始终潜伏在你的心中。此时此刻，它仿佛钢爪一样，死死地钳着你的喉咙。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, Kibellah's voice seems to multiply, as if every word were being spoken by several copies of her in unison:{/n} "Along the threads that form the web; along the rays of the star whose heart turns ice into flame; along the tracks we have left for one another, we shall come together in a unity that will become our revelation — in death which grants true sight; in death for which all are fated..." {n}Your knees buckle — the anxiety that has been with you since the beginning of the ritual now clamps around your throat like a collar of steel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}突然之间，绮贝菈的声音似乎从四面八方传来，仿佛每个字都是由很多个她齐声说出的。{/n}“沿着构成罗网的丝线，沿着恒星散发的光芒，它的心脏将寒冰化为烈焰。沿着我们为彼此留下的足迹前进，我们凝聚在一起，羁绊会为我们带来启示。通过死亡，我们会得知真理，在注定避无可避地死亡之中……”{n}你感觉膝盖发软。从仪式刚刚开始时，焦虑就始终潜伏在你的心中。此时此刻，它仿佛钢爪一样，死死地钳着你的喉咙。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La voix semble soudainement se démultiplier, comme si chaque mot était prononcé à l'unisson par des myriades de Kibellah.{/n} « Le long des fils qui forment la toile, le long des rayons de l'étoile dont le cœur transforme la glace en flamme, le long des chemins que nous avons tracés pour autrui, nous formerons un unisson qui deviendra notre révélation ; dans la mort qui accorde la vision, dans la mort à laquelle nous sommes tous destinés... » {n}Vous sentez vos genoux se dérober. L'angoisse que vous inspirait ce rituel vous enserre la gorge comme un collier d'acier.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, Kibellah's voice seems to multiply, as if every word were being spoken by several copies of her in unison:{/n} "Along the threads that form the web; along the rays of the star whose heart turns ice into flame; along the tracks we have left for one another, we shall come together in a unity that will become our revelation — in death which grants true sight; in death for which all are fated..." {n}Your knees buckle — the anxiety that has been with you since the beginning of the ritual now clamps around your throat like a collar of steel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix semble soudainement se démultiplier, comme si chaque mot était prononcé à l'unisson par des myriades de Kibellah.{/n} « Le long des fils qui forment la toile, le long des rayons de l'étoile dont le cœur transforme la glace en flamme, le long des chemins que nous avons tracés pour autrui, nous formerons un unisson qui deviendra notre révélation ; dans la mort qui accorde la vision, dans la mort à laquelle nous sommes tous destinés... » {n}Vous sentez vos genoux se dérober. L'angoisse que vous inspirait ce rituel vous enserre la gorge comme un collier d'acier.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kibellah'nın sesi, aniden kopyaları her bir kelimeyi ahenk içinde dile getiriyormuşçasına çoğalıyor gibi geliyor.{/n} "Ağı oluşturan ipliklerle beraber, çekirdeğindeki buzu aleve çeviren yıldızların ışınlarıyla beraber, başkaları için bıraktığımız izlerle beraber ikimizin vahyi olacak bir bütünlükte kavuşacağız. Hakiki görüşü bahşeden ölümde, herkesin kaderinde yazılı ölümde..." {n}Dizlerinin bağı çözülüyor. Ayinin başından beri peşini bırakmayan endişe, çelikten bir tasma misali pençelerini boğazına geçiriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, Kibellah's voice seems to multiply, as if every word were being spoken by several copies of her in unison:{/n} "Along the threads that form the web; along the rays of the star whose heart turns ice into flame; along the tracks we have left for one another, we shall come together in a unity that will become our revelation — in death which grants true sight; in death for which all are fated..." {n}Your knees buckle — the anxiety that has been with you since the beginning of the ritual now clamps around your throat like a collar of steel.{/n}
